column2: our server was very bad. It took her forever to greet our table
column3: took her forever to get our drinks
column4: our drinks came in all random orders
column5: our food came out of order when we specifically asked for certain things to be appetizers
column6: and some things that we ordered never showed up. All the while
column7: the waitress walked around with the haste of a slug. It was very frustrating to be sitting there
column9: to see her walk without any urgency. I say this having been a former server myself and having served during peak hours (similar to when we visited Little Goat).
